questionTitle: Could you please tell me if you have any electric typewriters ________?
Please come round this evening; I ________ to see you urgently.
My younger sister is very ________ and so she loves going out but I am much quieter and prefer to stay at home.
Can you ________ me a good pill against airsickness?
They were really ________ about my idea of joining them in London.
We were all taken ________ surprise when they announced their engagement.
I can't possibly lend you any money; it is quite out of the ________.
I wish you'd stop comparing my cooking ________ your mother's.
The bank will ________ you the money if you are prepared to pay them eight per cent interest on it.
He is intent on passing the examination, but I'm doubtful ________ his chances.
Beware ________ the dog.
The waiter's tip is included ________ the bill.
If you fail in this attempt, don't count ________ me for help.
I insist ________ your telling me the truth.
Do you mean to say you have never heard ________ Beethoven?
Even though he was more than sixty he had very few ________ on his face.
The cat showed her ________ for the stale fish by turning her back on it.
In about a week Tom ________ his summer holiday.
an Indian summer = ________.
anwers: a period of fine weather in early autumn

questionTitle: I ________ you that I had no intention of offending you.
